column2: A planet whose surface is completely urbanised. Skyscrapers and residential towers stretch high into the sky, and it is almost as if the whole planet consists of one city.
A Grand Ecumenopolis is a marvel of engineering that covers an entire planet. It can house a massive population, and potentially bring great wealth to its system.
A Bastion consists of a massive series of fortifications, automatic turrets, and missile defense systems. Without a doubt, the best defense that money can buy.
A large network of fortifications and turrets. A Bastion significantly increases the defensiveness of a system.
A large and luxurious Mansion in orbit around a planet. To be able to afford such a property is prestigious in and of itself.
A large and luxurious Mansion in orbit around a planet. To be able to afford such a property is prestigious in and of itself.
A regal symbol of the prestigious lineage of its builder, this grand Palace orbits around a planet.
column3: Symbole majestueux de la prestigieuse lignée de son constructeur, ce palais est unique en son genre.
column4: Dieser Palast ist ein königliches Symbol für die prestigeträchtige Linie seines Erbauers. Er ist einzigartig.
column6: Un símbolo real del prestigioso linaje de su constructor, este palacio es único en su especie.

column2: A regal symbol of the Prestigious lineage of its builder, it can also be equipped with a number of facilities that help the builder with their love life or court intrigue.
column3: Symbole royal de la prestigieuse lignée de son constructeur, il peut également être équipé de nombreux équipements qui l’aident dans sa vie amoureuse ou ses intrigues de cour.
column4: Als Symbol der königlichen und prestigeträchtigen Linie seines Erbauers kann es mit einer Reihe von Einrichtungen ausgestattet werden, die dem Erbauer bei seinem Liebesleben oder seiner Intrige helfen.
column6: Un símbolo real del prestigioso linaje de su constructor, también puede ser equipado con una serie de instalaciones que ayuden al constructor con su vida amorosa o la intriga cortesana.

column2: A Battleship Platform specializes in manufacturing, storing and deploying a substantial number of Battleships. A valuable addition to any military arsenal.
A Battleship Platform specializes in manufacturing, storing and deploying a substantial number of Battleships. A valuable addition to any military arsenal.
